channel.title: CVE Feed for Oracle Corporation -- Demantra Demand Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Oracle Corporation -- Demantra Demand Management

item.title: CVE-2019-2732|2024-10-15T19:00:27.706Z -- oracle%20corporation -- demantra%20demand%20management
item.description: Vulnerability in the Oracle Demantra Demand Management component of Oracle Supply Chain Products Suite (subcomponent: Product Security). The supported version that is affected is 7.3.1.5.2. Easily exploitable vulnerability allows unauthenticated attacker with network access via HTTP to compromise Oracle Demantra Demand Management. Successful attacks of this vulnerability can result in unauthorized read access to a subset of Oracle Demantra Demand Management accessible data. CVSS 3.0 Base Score 5.3 (Confidentiality impacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.0/AV:N/AC:L/PR:N/UI:N/S:U/C:L/I:N/A:N).
